title: DIH should extract multiple values for metadata fields extracted by Tika
description: The TikaEntityProcessor is currently pulling only the first value for a given metadata key.  If there are multiple values for a given metadata key as extracted by Tika, those values are currently being ignored.

comments.author: Tim Allison
comments.content: Wanted to ping on this while I came across it.  I'll try to put together a PR shortly.
